title: Pattern
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The pattern tag is used to specify a short hint that describes the expected value of an input field.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Adding a pattern to an input field
usageExamples.code: <input type='text' pattern='[A-Za-z]{3}' title='Three uppercase or lowercase letters'>

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.description: Using the pattern attribute with a custom message
usageExamples.code: <input type='text' pattern='.{8,}' title='Must contain at least 8 characters'>
